Snowbird Specials

Rent three weeks get one week FREE!!

Escape the chill of winter with a trip to Isle of Palms! Monthly discounts available for the months of January and February, please use the code SNOWBIRD or for more information and special pricing.

Welcome to The Beach Blessing!

This 4 bedroom luxury Isle of Palms vacation rental is the perfect beach house for your next family getaway, offering a peaceful stay on a quiet island street. The beach is only a quick walk away, there is a private heated pool and hot tub in the fully fenced backyard, and a short drive will land you nearby for many dining and shopping options on Isle of Palms. Additionally, historic downtown Charleston is only twenty-five minutes away, making your stay as full of exciting activities as possible. This beach house is pet friendly with a spacious fully fenced backyard.

A beautiful circular driveway leads to the home. This Charleston beach rental is painted in Sherwin-Williams “Colors of Historic Charleston” Beach Flower palette, reflecting Charleston’s worldly sophistication and Southern charm. These themes are seen continued throughout the house, and make sure your vacation is as relaxing and authentic as possible.

In the backyard, a private pool and hot tub, large lounge deck, outdoor kitchen, and outdoor shower are enclosed with a 6 foot privacy fence to provide an outdoor oasis to enjoy with family and friends. Also, a relaxing screened-in gazebo awaits you. This space is the perfect spot to enjoy the soothing sound of the sea at night, or to relish in the sun’s warmth while enjoying a book during the day.

Once inside, the open floor plan allows perfect flow for entertaining between the living room, dining room, and the large chef’s kitchen. The living room offers plenty of comfortable seating around the giant 75" flat-screen TV, creating the perfect space for family movie nights or get-togethers with all of your closest friends. The Beach Blessing also features a newly renovated and brand new gourmet chef’s kitchen and eat-in area, with a Wolf dual fuel gas range, a Sub-Zero fridge, a wine fridge, and an ultra quiet Bosch dishwasher. The inviting kitchen island offers wrap-around seating for six, and is the perfect place for breakfast before the beach or gathering around while cooking a family dinner. Also, located just off the kitchen, a barn door leads to a full bath and laundry room, conveniently located for use by all guests.

Down the hall, a spacious, relaxing, and comfortable owner’s retreat is found, complete with a large California King bed and an ensuite bathroom. The calming atmosphere throughout the home is carried into this space, making for the perfect getaway after long days by the sea. In the bathroom, double vanities accompany a large marble walk-in shower, creating a spa-like space that you won’t want to leave.

Also in this Isle of Palms beach house, a second bedroom features a king sized bed, and provides the perfect space for other guests. This room shares a full bathroom with the third bedroom, a spacious and exciting room with four Twin XL beds, great for a children’s vacation oasis. The fourth bedroom has a king size bed, looks out onto the private backyard, with it's own sliding glass door for entry and exit. The Beach Blessing is equipped with a Navien tankless water heater to provide limitless hot water.

Outside the home, a relaxing screened-in gazebo awaits you. This space is the perfect spot to enjoy the soothing sound of the sea at night, or to relish in the sun’s warmth while enjoying a book during the day. A large fenced in yard is a great space for children and pets to spend the evenings.

Isle of Palms beach lies just a short walk away from this beautiful and relaxing home, and makes this home an even more exciting place to spend your vacation. The open floor plan and the sophisticated but calming design of this space ensures a peaceful vacation for you and your family, and makes for a home that you will never want to leave. We hope to see you soon at The Beach Blessing.

Linens / Toiletries - All bed linens, kitchen towels and bath towels are provided for your convenience. Also included is a "starter set" of toiletries such as toilet paper, bath & dish soaps, shampoo & conditioner, paper towels, etc. but please keep in mind you will most likely need to purchase these items after your initial arrival.

Parking - A maximum of 4 vehicles can be parked at this property.

Rates & Availability

Welcome to The Beach Blessing!

This 4 bedroom luxury Isle of Palms vacation rental is the perfect beach house for your next family getaway, offering a peaceful stay on a quiet island street. The beach is only a quick walk away, there is a private heated pool and hot tub in the fully fenced backyard, and a short drive will land you nearby for many dining and shopping options on Isle of Palms. Additionally, historic downtown Charleston is only twenty-five minutes away, making your stay as full of exciting activities as possible. This beach house is pet friendly with a spacious fully fenced backyard.

A beautiful circular driveway leads to the home. This Charleston beach rental is painted in Sherwin-Williams “Colors of Historic Charleston” Beach Flower palette, reflecting Charleston’s worldly sophistication and Southern charm. These themes are seen continued throughout the house, and make sure your vacation is as relaxing and authentic as possible.

In the backyard, a private pool and hot tub, large lounge deck, outdoor kitchen, and outdoor shower are enclosed with a 6 foot privacy fence to provide an outdoor oasis to enjoy with family and friends. Also, a relaxing screened-in gazebo awaits you. This space is the perfect spot to enjoy the soothing sound of the sea at night, or to relish in the sun’s warmth while enjoying a book during the day.

Once inside, the open floor plan allows perfect flow for entertaining between the living room, dining room, and the large chef’s kitchen. The living room offers plenty of comfortable seating around the giant 75" flat-screen TV, creating the perfect space for family movie nights or get-togethers with all of your closest friends. The Beach Blessing also features a newly renovated and brand new gourmet chef’s kitchen and eat-in area, with a Wolf dual fuel gas range, a Sub-Zero fridge, a wine fridge, and an ultra quiet Bosch dishwasher. The inviting kitchen island offers wrap-around seating for six, and is the perfect place for breakfast before the beach or gathering around while cooking a family dinner. Also, located just off the kitchen, a barn door leads to a full bath and laundry room, conveniently located for use by all guests.

Down the hall, a spacious, relaxing, and comfortable owner’s retreat is found, complete with a large California King bed and an ensuite bathroom. The calming atmosphere throughout the home is carried into this space, making for the perfect getaway after long days by the sea. In the bathroom, double vanities accompany a large marble walk-in shower, creating a spa-like space that you won’t want to leave.

Also in this Isle of Palms beach house, a second bedroom features a king sized bed, and provides the perfect space for other guests. This room shares a full bathroom with the third bedroom, a spacious and exciting room with four Twin XL beds, great for a children’s vacation oasis. The fourth bedroom has a king size bed, looks out onto the private backyard, with it's own sliding glass door for entry and exit. The Beach Blessing is equipped with a Navien tankless water heater to provide limitless hot water.

Outside the home, a relaxing screened-in gazebo awaits you. This space is the perfect spot to enjoy the soothing sound of the sea at night, or to relish in the sun’s warmth while enjoying a book during the day. A large fenced in yard is a great space for children and pets to spend the evenings.

Isle of Palms beach lies just a short walk away from this beautiful and relaxing home, and makes this home an even more exciting place to spend your vacation. The open floor plan and the sophisticated but calming design of this space ensures a peaceful vacation for you and your family, and makes for a home that you will never want to leave. We hope to see you soon at The Beach Blessing.

Linens / Toiletries - All bed linens, kitchen towels and bath towels are provided for your convenience. Also included is a "starter set" of toiletries such as toilet paper, bath & dish soaps, shampoo & conditioner, paper towels, etc. but please keep in mind you will most likely need to purchase these items after your initial arrival.

Parking - A maximum of 4 vehicles can be parked at this property.

Pool Access: Private Pool, *Can be heated for additional fee of $275/night

Rates & Availability

One hundred percent (100.00%) of the total booking charges will be refunded if the cancellation is made more than 60 days prior to the arrival date of the reservation. Fifty percent (50.00%) of the total booking charges will be refunded if the cancellation is made more than 30 days prior to the arrival date of the reservation. For cancellations made within 30 days prior to the arrival date, no refund will be issued.

Barnacle Beach Retreat – 5 Barnacle Row, Isle of Palms, South CarolinaRenovated Coastal Home Steps From the Beach Path in Wild Dunes | Isle of Palms

Welcome to Barnacle Beach Retreat

Barnacle Beach Retreat is a beautifully renovated Isle of Palms vacation rental tucked just inside the gates of Wild Dunes—perfect for families and groups seeking comfort, beach access, and relaxed coastal living. With four bedrooms, three bathrooms, generous gathering spaces, and a direct beach path right out the back door, this Wild Dunes home offers a peaceful, family-friendly retreat less than three minutes from the sand.

✨ What You’ll Love ✨*4 Bedrooms • 3 Bathrooms • Sleeps up to 11*Two king bedrooms + one queen room + one room with two queens*Additional sleeping area with full-size sleeper sofa*Direct beach path behind the home—3-minute walk to the sand*Professionally decorated with coastal-modern furnishings*Fully stocked kitchen with breakfast nook + formal dining area*Screened-in patio with comfortable lounge seating*Fire pit with rocking chairs for cozy evenings*Beach gear credit included with all stays (3–21 nights)*High-speed WiFi, washer & dryer, linens, and essentials provided*Located inside Wild Dunes near resort paths and amenities

🏡 The SpaceElegant Indoor LivingStep into a bright, professionally decorated coastal retreat designed for relaxation and easy gathering. The spacious living room offers comfortable seating for the whole family—perfect for movie nights, games, and reconnecting after a day in the waves. Coastal décor and soft, modern finishes bring the beach indoors, creating a serene experience from the moment you arrive.

🍽️ Chef’s Kitchen & DiningThe fully stocked kitchen sits just off the dining room and features upgraded appliances, renovated finishes, and everything you need for effortless cooking. Enjoy early-morning breakfasts at the breakfast nook or host family dinners at the dining table before heading outside to the fire pit.

The kitchen is equipped with all essentials—cookware, serveware, coffee maker, toaster, and more—making meal prep simple and enjoyable.

🛏️ Comfortable BedroomsThis home features four well-appointed bedrooms, ideal for families and groups:

King Bedroom 1 – King bed with ensuite bath• Spacious and professionally decorated

King Bedroom 2 – King bed with ensuite bath• Comfortable layout for couples or additional adult guests

Queen Bedroom – One queen bed with shared hall bath• Peaceful coastal design

Double Queen Bedroom – Two queen beds with shared hall bath• Perfect for teens, friends, or additional family members

Kids’ Area – Full-size sleeper sofa• Additional flexible sleeping space

All rooms are furnished with comfortable mattresses and bedding to ensure restful nights before long beach days.

☀️ Outdoor Living & RelaxationEnjoy the shaded, breezy screened-in patio, a favorite spot for afternoon lounging, reading, or late-night conversations. Just beyond, the direct beach path makes getting to the sand quick and effortless.After a day at the beach, gather around the outdoor fire pit in rocking chairs—perfect for s’mores, good company, and salty evening air.

🚗 Guest Access & ParkingGuests have private access to the entire home, including all bedrooms, bathrooms, living areas, kitchen, screened porch, and outdoor spaces.• Parking for up to 4 vehicles• Beach gear credit included (3–21-night stays)• Located steps from the beach and inside the Wild Dunes gates

Please note the home is not wheelchair accessible.This setup is ideal for multigenerational families and groups who value comfort, privacy, and generous sleeping space.

🛁 Inspired BathroomsEach bedroom includes its own private full bath, offering spa-quality design and convenience. A sixth full bathroom ensures ample space for everyone. Fresh towels and a starter set of toiletries are provided for your stay.

☀️ Outdoor Living & AmenitiesStep into your personal backyard paradise. The professionally landscaped space features:Private poolHot tubPollywood outdoor furnitureCovered custom cabana barWeber BBQ grillString lights & outdoor fans

Spacious patio perfect for lounging or al fresco dining

Whether you're taking a refreshing swim, grilling dinner, or relaxing under the oak trees, the outdoor area is designed for creating lasting vacation memories.

🚗 Guest Access & ParkingGuests have private access to the entire home, including:All bedrooms, bathrooms, and living spacesGourmet kitchenScreened porch & multiple balconiesPrivate pool, hot tub & cabana areaElevator (instructions sent before arrival)Parking is available for up to 6 vehicles.

Beach gear credit, check-in instructions, elevator information, and arrival details will be shared before your stay.

Linens / Toiletries - All bed linens, kitchen towels and bath towels are provided for your convenience. Also included is a "starter set" of toiletries such as toilet paper, bath & dish soaps, shampoo & conditioner, paper towels, etc. but please keep in mind you will most likely need to purchase these items after your initial arrival.

Parking - A maximum of 4 vehicles can be parked at this property.

Professional management is provided for this listing by IOP Escapes Vacation Rental

Important notes:

✧ Please be advised that all guests will be asked to sign a rental usage agreement that governs the terms of the stay. By completing the reservation you agree to the following:✧ You agree to be bound by our rental terms and conditions.✧ You acknowledge that you may be asked to provide a copy of your official government-issued photo ID, confirm your contact information, provide a valid credit card with a name that matches your ID, and pass through our verification portal and, in some instances, complete a criminal background check. The information is collected for screening and verification only and is not stored or used for any other purposes. ✧ You understand that your check-in instructions might be withheld until you have successfully completed the rental agreement and provided a copy of valid ID.✧ Any guest who confirms a reservation will be responsible for damages in an amount outlined in the rental agreement. An authorization hold in the amount of $750.00 will be placed on your credit card. It will be removed once you check-out and if nothing is damaged.

We are happy to host you for your stay with us! Please keep the following rules in mind during your stay:1) Local guest reservation requests are subject to further review and questions. Please provide full name, # of guests, and reason for booking.2) Reservations should include the correct number of guests staying. Please ask the host for permission to bring visitors over to the property.3) Isle of Palms Noise Ordinance must be followed. Any violations of the noise ordinance are cause for immediate removal.4) Please be courteous and respectful of the other neighboring residents and guests. Any behavior that results in a complaint by a neighbor, building resident, or HOA is considered violation of this rule.5) If you have any issues during your stay, please notify us immediately. At check-out please leave the place as you found it upon your arrival. Any costs to repair or replace an item, fixture, or furnishing found damaged after your stay must be compensated by you. All damage and replacement costs include a labor charge.6) Smoking, Vaping, and Parties of any kind are strictly forbidden.7) Guests agree to follow the cancellation policy at the time of booking, and agree to any cancellation fee that may apply in the event of a cancellation. Guests agree there are no exceptions to the policy including illness, travel restrictions due to weather, and reasons related to Covid-19. Travel Insurance is offered to cover losses for cancellations during full penalty cancellation period.10) Guests should inspect the property upon checking-in and notify Management of any issues, damage, missing amenities, or unsatisfactory conditions. Should there be an issue, guests will allow a reasonable amount of time during business hours for Management to address or provide a solution for any reported issues, or unsatisfactory conditions.11)Pet fee required for all pet friendly rentals

* It is the guests' responsibility to ensure they have all their belongings before checking out. If guests would like an item shipped to them, there is a minimum of $25 shipping and handling fee plus the cost of shipping. We will hold items for 1 week if guests would like to coordinate a pickup of an item.

Rates & Availability

One hundred percent (100.00%) of the total booking charges will be refunded if the cancellation is made more than 60 days prior to the arrival date of the reservation. Fifty percent (50.00%) of the total booking charges will be refunded if the cancellation is made more than 30 days prior to the arrival date of the reservation. For cancellations made within 30 days prior to the arrival date, no refund will be issued.
